text: Harsha Bhogle (born 19 July 1961) is an Indian cricket commentator and journalist. Bhogle has cemented his reputation as being a personality in the global cricket broadcasting industry.Going beyond talent Business Today == References == == Other websites == * * * Harsha Bhogle's columns at The Indian Express * Out of the Box with Harsha Bhogle on YouTube Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Hyderabad, India Category:Indian Premier League Category:1961 births Category:Indian journalists
title: Harsha Bhogle
